item.title: Heidi Klum Is Too Ill to Continue Taping 'America's Got Talent'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: It's said that only 3 judges, Howie Mandel, Simon Cowell and new judge Sofia Vergara, that enter the stage with Heidi missing during the filming, which features a full audience.

item.title: 'The Wendy Williams Show' to Eliminate Audience During Live Taping in Light of Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The TV personality announces on Instagram that while she 'values her co-hosts and their daily participation,' her talk show will not have studio audience until 'the time is right.'

item.title: John Krasinski Secures His First Guest-Hosting Stint on 'Saturday Night Live'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Upon learning that he will front the long-running sketch show, the actor/director of 'A Quiet Place Part II' comes forward with a confession to his mother about his childhood secret.

item.title: 'Bachelor' Finale Part 2 Recap: Peter Weber Finally Picks His Lady Despite Tension
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The Tuesday, March 10 episode of the long-running ABC dating show picked up with the pilot on the day of the final rose ceremony following Madison's departure.

item.title: Brad Pitt and Viola Davis to Join Forces With 'Property Brothers' Stars for 'Celebrity IOU'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The new series from HGTV network will see celebrity guests working with Drew and Jonathan Scott to reward special people in their lives with surprise renovations.

item.title: Kaley Cuoco Denies Helping Sister Briana Get a Role on 'Flight Attendant'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: 'The Big Bang Theory' alum insists that her sister landed the role with her own effort, pointing out that about 20 people loved her performance during the audition.

item.title: Alexis Skyy Gets Candid About Being 'Sold' at 15 in New 'LHH: Atlanta' Season 9 Trailer
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In addition, the new season will see the TV star having a physical altercation with fellow 'LHH: Atlanta' cast member Karlie as she appears to be secretly married to someone whom Alexis is dating.

item.title: 'Jeopardy!' and 'Wheel of Fortune' Decide to Tape Without Audience Due to Coronavirus Outbreak
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: It is further said that the production team of each show makes the decision considering that most of the audience members of both 'Jeopardy!' and 'Wheel of Fortune' are people in their 60s.

item.title: Jessica Simpson Says 'Newlyweds' Was Her Father's Idea
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: During an interview on 'On Air! with Ryan Seacrest', the 'With You' hitmaker also says that she doesn't regret doing the reality show with her ex-husband Nick Lachey.

item.title: 'Bachelor' Finale 1 Recap: Peter Weber Breaks Up With [SPOILER]
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In the first part of 'The Bachelor' season 24 finale, Peter asks his family in Australia to help him make decision which one to chose between the two remaining ladies, Hannah Ann or Madison.

item.title: Terrence Howard Accuses FOX of Failing to Pay His 'Empire' Fees
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The Lucious Lyon depicter launches his breach of contract lawsuit days after the network filed a separate suit against him and his company for entangling it in his legal battle with ex-wife.

item.title: 'American Idol' Recap: Judges Moved to Tears by Two Contestants
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The episode also sees Makayla Phillips returning to the show to audition as she was two weeks too young when she auditioned back in 2017, and this time, she impresses everyone.

item.title: 'RHOA': Kenya Moore Details Her Failed Marriage to Marc Daly, Accuses Him of Cheating
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: 'My instinct says he's doing something else because I look around and I see these text messages,' Kenya reveals to co-stars Kandi Burruss and Cynthia Bailey during an intimate talk.

item.title: Luke Evans to Reunite With Josh Gad in 'Beauty and the Beast' Prequel Series
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The two actors, who portray Gaston and his sidekick LeFou in the 2017 live-action film, will reprise their roles on a six-episode musical limited series for Disney+.

item.title: Luke Hemsworth's Bicep Injury Costs Him A Kick in the Face on 'Westworld'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Attending the season three premiere of the sci-fi series in Los Angeles, the actor known for his portrayal of Ashley Stubbs talks about his fight scenes with co-star Evan Rachel Wood.

item.title: Ellen Pompeo Urges Fans to Celebrate 'Grey's Anatomy' Crew Following Alex Karev Sendoff
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In a statement she released one day after the airing of Justin Chambers' final episode, the leading lady of the hit medical drama thanks 'the best most passionate most loyal fans anyone could ever ask for.'

item.title: 'RuPaul's Drag Race' Disqualifies Sherry Pie Over Catfishing Claims
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: This decision arrives after aspiring actor Ben Shimkus accused Sherry, whose birthname is Joey Gugliemelli, of catfishing him in a lengthy Facebook post detailing his alleged experience with the drag performer.

item.title: Elizabeth Hurley to Play Hannah Simone's Mother on New Comedy Series
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: This TV project about an unorganized single mum called on to replace her network boss daughter's babysitter comes from 'Spider-Man: Homecoming' writers John Francis Daley and Jonathan Goldstein.

item.title: Ty Burrell Spills Why Filming Final 'Modern Family' Scene Was 'Pretty Challenging'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: When stopping by 'Late Night with Seth Meyers', the Emmy-nominated actor opens up about overwhelming emotions over his last outing as Phil Dunphy for the hit comedy series.

item.title: Cynthia Bailey on How Kenya Moore's Husband Treats Her at Charity Event: 'He's Not Nice'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Kenya also addresses the matter, saying, 'Respect? What's that?' in response to a question whether or not she thinks Marc was respectful to her throughout the process of the event.

item.title: 'The Real': People Cracking Up Over Amanda Seales' Expression When Loni Love Is Crying
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In the episode, The TV host can't help but cry as she talks about the fact that many African Americans suffer from obesity-related illnesses due to lack of proper nutrition.

item.title: Heidi Klum Has This Advice for Sofia Vergara's Judging Stint on 'America's Got Talent'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Returning to the TV talent show after missing out one season, the former 'Project Runway' host says at the season 15 premiere event that she and the 'Modern Family' star are going to have fun together.

item.title: Anna Paquin's TV Show 'Flack' Exed After Two Seasons
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The television series fronted by the former 'True Blood' actress has been canceled after running for two seasons following the layoffs of the channel's 100 employees.

item.title: Mischa Barton Disses Rival Caroline D'Amore Following Rumored Firing From 'The Hills'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The former cast member of 'The Beautiful Life' responds to her alleged exit from 'The Hills' reboot and takes a dig at the woman who is rumored to be her replacement on the show.

item.title: 'RHONJ' Reunion: Jennifer Aydin Blasts Melissa Gorga Over Alleged Fake Storylines About Pregnancy
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.category: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
item.description: In addition to faking stories about baby No. 4, the 'Real Housewives of New Jersey' cast member allegedly fakes stories about her restaurant and long-lost sister.

item.title: Watch: David Beckham Keeps His Cool When Justin Bieber Tries to Scare Him
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Although the 'Yummy' hitmaker jumps out of a box during 'The Ellen DeGeneres Show' in a scare attempt, the retired soccer star praises him 'the most amazing human being.'

item.title: Report: MTV Pulls the Plug on 'Teen Mom: Young and Pregnant'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The franchise show is seemingly not the only one whose fate was in limbo as it was previoulsy rumored that the network plans to cancel 'Teen Mom OG' after 10 years.

item.title: 'The Masked Singer' Recap: The Taco's Identity Is Revealed
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The new episode of the FOX singing competition show features the four remaining singers from Group B taking the stage to flaunt their skills, though only 3 of them head to the Super 9.

item.title: Mischa Barton Fired From 'The Hills' Reboot Because She's 'Boring'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Ouija House' actress is reportedly axed from the rebooted reality television show because her storyline is bland and she doesn't bring enough drama.

item.title: Usher Can't Wait to Join New Dance Competition Series 'The Sauce'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Love in this Club' hitmaker will serve as judge and executive producer for the reality series, which will air on the streaming service Quibi in early April.
